SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Cooms et al. 2008; derived from given implementation and transaction costs; Coomes, O. T., Grimard, F., Potvin, C., & Sima, P. (2008). The fate of the tropical forest: Carbon or cattle?. Ecological Economics, 65(2), 207-212.
Assumptions: Refer page 208 and 209; $628,964 is the total cost of implementation of the CDM-AR project in the 692 hectares of areas; whereas the establishment cost is half of this amount. Moreover, 50,000 of this amount goes for transaction cost, so that was also reduced from the net establishment cost.
